TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WizardNavigationEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides data for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.CurrentStepIndex%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.NextStepIndex%2A> property for navigation in wizard controls.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The WizardNavigationEventArgs class provides the data needed for the various navigation events in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control. For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NextButtonClick> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control uses the WizardNavigationEventArgs object to indicate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.CurrentStepIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.NextStepIndex%2A> for the control.
For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 currentStepIndex, int32 nextStepIndex) cil managed

Docs.param: The index of the object that is currently displayed in the control.
The index of the object that the control will display next.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the navigation to the next step in the wizard should be canceled.
Docs.value: if the navigation to the next step should be canceled; otherwise, . The default value is .
Docs.returns: if the navigation to the next step should be canceled; otherwise, . The default value is .

Docs.summary: Gets the index of the object currently displayed in the control.
Docs.value: A zero-based index value that represents the object that is currently displayed in the control.
Docs.returns: A zero-based index value that represents the object that is currently displayed in the control.

Docs.summary: Gets a value that represents the index of the object that the control will display next.
Docs.value: A zero-based index value that represents the object that the control will display next.
Docs.returns: A zero-based index value that represents the object that the control will display next.
